name: Mirabelle and the Flies
description:
You play as Mirabelle, a spider raised by an empire of ants that is beset by a raiding horde of flies and wasps.  To make matters worse the ant queen has been captured and the most likely culprits are the flies.  Now, you must capture the flies to figure out what they have done with the queen.

Climb grass stalks, push pebbles and twigs, avoid thistles and wasps, ride feathers, bounce on leaves, and balloon across the levels to capture flies and return them to your webs.
